titleStmt.title: The Lord General Cromwel's speech delivered in the Council-Chamber, upon the 4 of July, 1653. To the persons then assembled, and intrusted with the supreme authority of the nation. This is a true copie: published for information, and to prevent mistakes.
titleStmt.author: Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
